nodes.text: Doctor Hu Marell was considered to be Galactic Republic's top battlefield surgeon during the war with the Sith Empire. While saving wounded soldiers in a secret hospital on Quesh, he attracted the attention of an HK-51 assassin droid and considered for elimination among two other targets.

Doctor Marell was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during conversations between Imperial players and their HK-51 units. He is also listed in the game's NPC file with HK-51's other targets, but whatever missions that would have involved Marell and the others never made it into the game.
